title: Musekinin Kanchou Tylor (The Irresponsible Captain Tylor)
synopsis: Justy Ueki Tylor is an average 20-year-old man: lazy, greedy, and a passionate womanizer. He plans to land an easy job with the United Planets Space Force that pays decently and is also far away from the rigorous combat raging throughout the galaxy.
